I don't know why exactly your torrents aren't receiving any comments but...

I just registered an account specifically to thank you for the MAGNIFICENT amount of effort behind your truly AWESOME and PROFESSIONAL made torrents : Burzum, Metallica, Dodheimsgard, Gorgoroth, Immortal & other COMPLETE DISCOGRAPHIES.

Needless to say that FLAC(s) are more than welcome and I think a special "Thank you!" is in place just for this thing alone.
But to submit also the 320kbps (the highest MP3 quality) of the exact same thing (with Hi-Res covers, booklets and whatnot) is just the way things should've always been done.

Being a collector myself I understand the amount of work and attention required to obtain such COMPLETE & ACCURATE discographies (including bonus tracks, hidden tracks, japanese or other special editions etc.)
Gigantic stuff, superbly made, just like your other torrents.

I just hope YOUR manner of creating/uploading torrents becomes the new standard.

Looking forward for more of your great stuff.

Thank you once again, you have my (and I'm sure, MANY, MANY others') utmost appreciation!

P.S.
It's most unfortunate how these torrents don't receive a simple "thanks" when they deserve thousands.
Thanks m8, "Kargeras" speaks my mind as well. Just opened this account to say thanks for the supperb work!!!
